ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the duration of the substance use (e.g., Record how long the subject has smoked).

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUDUR
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM-based dataset, concatenating the CDASH collected duration and collected duration unit and populate the SDTMIG variable SUDUR in ISO 8601 format. Example: 1DT2H (for 1 day, 2 hours).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This is only collected on the CRF if this level of detail is needed and if SUSTDAT & SUENDAT are not collected on the CRF.
